Description: Dimensions all grids in the active view.
Tags all rooms in the active view.
Code:
var rooms = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, doc.ActiveView.Id).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Rooms).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElements();
foreach(var r in rooms) { if(r.Location is LocationPoint lp) { doc.Create.NewRoomTag(new LinkElementId(r.Id), new UV(lp.Point.X, lp.Point.Y), doc.ActiveView.Id); } }

var tb = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FamilySymbol)).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault();
if (tb != null) { var sheet = ViewSheet.Create(doc, tb.Id); sheet.Name = "AI Generated Sheet"; sheet.SheetNumber = "A101"; }

Description: API Concept: How to create standard walls.
Code: Wall.Create(doc, Line.CreateBound(p1, p2), wallType.Id, level.Id, height, 0, false, false);

Description: API Concept: How to create floors.
Code: Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, floorType.Id, level.Id);

Description: API Concept: How to create footprint roofs.
API Concept: How to create ceilings.
Code: Ceiling.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, ceilingType.Id, level.Id);

Description: API Concept: Place a family instance (Column).

Code: var path = new List<Curve> { Line.CreateBound(p1, p2) };

Description: API Concept: Create railing on a path.
API Concept: Draw a model line in 3D.
API Concept: Revit uses Feet internally.
Code:
double feet = meters * 3.28084;
double feet = mm / 304.8;

Description: API Concept: Create a grid line.

Code: Wall.Create(doc, Line.CreateBound(XYZ.Zero, new XYZ(10,0,0)), wallType.Id, level.Id, 13.12, 0, false, false);
